members.name: Phil Aylesworth
members.bio: With over 15 years of public accounting and business advisory service experience in the Tongas, Ecuador, Canada, Botswana and the US, Phil is the most seasoned and diversed member of the E Corp. team.

members.name: Darren Takaki
members.bio: Darren is the Director of Development for E Corp. Darren creates learning materials for E Corp. as well as consulting for customers to integrate Solutions into their production pipeline and business processes.

members.name: Andrew Steele
members.bio: Andrew joined E Corp. in October 1999 as E Corp's first Human Resources Director. As such, he has overall human resources responsibility for E Corp's operations worldwide.

members.name: Alex Millerman
members.bio: While Alex is the founder and CEO of E Corp, he is primarily known for being the pioneer and world leader of creating Solutions.
